verses.verse: Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou art <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>, and there <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> yet <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to be <S%H3423>possessed<s%>.
This is the <S%H776>land<s%> that yet <S%H7604>remaineth<s%>: all the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and all <S%H1651>Geshuri<s%>,

From <S%H7883>Sihor<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even unto the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, which is <S%H2803>counted<s%> to the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>: <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; the <S%H5841>Gazathites<s%>, and the <S%H796>Ashdothites<s%>, the <S%H832>Eshkalonites<s%>, the <S%H1663>Gittites<s%>, and the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%>; also the <S%H5761>Avites<s%>:

From the <S%H8486>south<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and <S%H4632>Mearah<s%> that is beside the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%>, unto <S%H663>Aphek<s%>, to the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>:

And the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1382>Giblites<s%>, and all <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, toward the <S%H4217%H8121>sunrising<s%>, from <S%H1171>Baal-gad<s%> under <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> unto the <S%H935>entering<s%> into <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>.

All the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> unto <S%H4956>Misrephoth-maim<s%>, and all the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%>, them will I drive <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: only divide thou it by <S%H5307>lot<s%> unto the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee.

Now therefore <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>,

With whom the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, even as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them;

From <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, that is upon the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>, and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> of <S%H4311>Medeba<s%> unto <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>;

And all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

And <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and <S%H4602>Maachathites<s%>, and all <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> unto <S%H5548>Salcah<s%>;

All the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and in <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, who <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%>: for these did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%>, and cast them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>expelled<s%> not the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%>, nor the <S%H4602>Maachathites<s%>: but the <S%H1650>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4601>Maachathites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> until this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Only unto the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> none <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; the <S%H801>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> are their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto them.
¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> inheritance according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, that is on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>, and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> by <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>;
<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and all her <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are in the <S%H4334>plain<s%>; <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and <S%H1120>Bamoth-baal<s%>, and <S%H1010>Beth-baal-meon<s%>,
And <S%H3096>Jahazah<s%>, and <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%>, and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%>,
And <S%H7156>Kirjathaim<s%>, and <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>, and <S%H6890>Zareth-shahar<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>,
And <S%H1047>Beth-peor<s%>, and <S%H798%H794>Ashdoth-pisgah<s%>, and <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth<s%>,

And all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> with the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H189>Evi<s%>, and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, and <S%H7254>Reba<s%>, which were <S%H5257>dukes<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>, <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%>.

¶ <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%>, the <S%H7080>soothsayer<s%>, did the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> among <S%H413>them<s%> that were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by them.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> was <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof. This was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> inheritance unto the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, even unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, unto <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>;
And from <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> unto <S%H7434>Ramath-mizpeh<s%>, and <S%H993>Betonim<s%>; and from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%>;

And in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, <S%H1027>Beth-aram<s%>, and <S%H1039>Beth-nimrah<s%>, and <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H6829>Zaphon<s%>, the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and his <S%H1366>border<s%>, even unto the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> inheritance unto the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: and this was the possession of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%>, all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and all the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%>, which are in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>:

And <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>, and <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, were pertaining unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, even to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

These are the countries which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> did distribute for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, by <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.

But unto the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> not any <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto them.
